about_the_game:
Wallpaper Play enables you to use dynamic wallpapers on your desktop. It supports setting videos as wallpapers, making the taskbar transparent, and activating typing - following skins, making your desktop more lively and interesting. You can also create your own wallpapers and share them on the Workshop for a better experience.

Features:

  • Set videos as dynamic wallpapers to make your desktop more vivid.

  • Support multiple aspect ratios, including 16:9, 16:10, 21:9, 4:3, etc.

  • Support multi - monitor display.

  • Share and download wallpapers using the Steam Workshop.

  • Supported video formats: mp4, mkv, avi, mov, wmv, m4v, etc. (Only mp4 is supported in the Workshop).

1. Set videos as dynamic wallpapers

2. Make the taskbar transparent

3. Typing animation: Once enabled, an adorable typing pet will appear on the screen, hitting the keyboard in sync with the user's typing.
